subject: Simsonn plus x squeaky clutch
description_text:
Hello, I recently got the simsonn plus x as a Christmas gift but after a
few days of use, the clutch seems to have a squeaking problem. The throttle
pedal seems to have this noise as well but only occasionally. I've read the
manual and have applied the recommended ptfe dry lube on the indicated
clutch points and have given it time to settle in.

It seems I am still having issues with the squeaky noise returning multiple
times very quickly or not eliminating the noise at all. Is there any way to
resolve this?

I have attached a video for reference. Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Alvander Lor,    The video you uploaded is incomplete and cannot be opened properly. Please share the video via Google Drive and make sure the link access is set to viewable, so we can review it.  In addition, lubrication can be applied to all moving joints. Please note that the hydraulic damper is filled with fluid, and it is normal to hear some noise during movement.
